ygData.messageBody:
Hiyas,

>
>Contrary to belief, hitting a mob from behind does give extra bonus. About
>2 years ago Verant posted there is an extra (if slight) benefit from
attacking
>behind; lower AC?
>

I've experienced this as well.. However I believe it more likely comes from
the fact that some defensive skills don't work when something's attacking
you from behind. Most mobs are based off the warrior class so inherent the
same defense skills i.e. Riposte, etc. Truth be told as a ranger I prefer to
avoid the brunt of the attack and position myself behind the target while
grouped. I can take advantage of the slight bonus and take in the less
damage. =)

DuHase 55 Outrider
